description: Fired when an entity's turn ends.

payloadSchema.title: Core: Turn Ended Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:turn_ended' event.

entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity whose turn is ending.

success.description: Indicates whether the turn was completed successfully. True if the primary action of the turn was successful, false otherwise (e.g., failed move, invalid action).

error.description: Optional. Details of an error if the turn did not complete successfully or resulted in an error state.
